about_the_game:
The Dawning of a New Story

Kyōtabi is an Indie ARPG project solely developed by ComplicatedEgg. Bigger development news will be announced on Steam, and smaller news will be announced on the Bōken Party Discord server. Play single-player in the story mode or play with others in online multiplayer.

Embark on a Fateful Journey


The land of Ryūsei is facing an imminent calamity. Using their arsenal of powerful monsters, an evil organisation named Zenith is bent on conquering Ryūsei's four nations. Play as Kyoko, a fox spirit, and embark on a fateful journey to prevent Ryūsei from falling into the wrong hands.

Find Strength in Companionship


Stopping an evil organisation requires a strong and tight team. Meet new companions during your adventure; each possessing unique skills and fighting techniques. Form strong bonds, complete tasks together, and partake in perilous battles against your enemies to put an end to the threat looming over your homeland.

Save Ryūsei Once and for All


Alongside your party, you must build the power to preserve Ryūsei from conquest. Who knows what obstacles you'll come across?

name: Kyōtabi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX570 or NVIDIA GTX 1650
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Rift S, Valve Index, HTC Vive, etc
  • Additional Notes: Subject to Change due to lack of optimisation
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 or Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX5700 or NVIDIA RTX 2060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Rift S, Valve Index, HTC Vive, etc
  • Additional Notes: Subject to Change due to lack of optimisation

short_description: Travel the land of Ryūsei, meet new companions and defeat an evil organisation together. Kyōtabi is an Indie ARPG that will take you on a new journey filled with hardship and contentment. Follow Kyoko as she defeats Zenith in story mode, or go online and play together with other adventurers!
